thread.section_title: Hotel Joyce - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great for the price!
thread.title_full: Great for the price! - Review of Hotel Joyce - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: windowbird
title: Great for the price!
text: I highly recommend this hotel! The service is excellent and the staff is very helpful. Upon arrival, Douglas (front desk staff) walked me through a map of Paris and made lots of good recommendations about getting around. Location is wonderful. There's a wonderful cafe on the block (Bo Man Cafe) that I went to most nights for a glass of wine before dinner, and you're only 3 minutes from the closest Metro station (St. George). Good (safe) location, helpful staff, comfortable rooms. As a solo traveler, this was perfect.
